snippet.title: Free prologue to The Darkest Tales — Into the Nightmare available now!
snippet.description:
The free The Darkest Tales - Into the Nightmare will become the first chapter in your journey across the world of corrupted fairy tales. 
Will you be able to hack your way through familiar, yet twisted characters with nothing but a pair of rusty scissors, then come face-to-face with your greatest fears? 

All progress saved in the free version will be automatically carried over into the full version of The Darkest Tales.

✔️ Play The Darkest Tales - Into the Nightmare for free on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1747650/The_Darkest_Tales__Into_the_Nightmare/

👉 Official The Darkest Tales Steam page https://store.steampowered.com/app/1307690/The_Darkest_Tales/

👋 Join The Darkest Tales Discord server https://discord.gg/vYQaVv4X53
